title: Student Registration Form
description: A modern and fully responsive Student Registration Form that ensures an intuitive and seamless registration process. It features real-time validation, password strength indication, and profile photo upload, making it user-friendly and efficient.

title: Amirty University
description: A responsive website showcasing Amirty University's courses, facilities, and contact information, designed for easy navigation and information access.

title: Weather Now
description: Weather Now is a real-time weather application that provides current weather conditions, air quality data, and local time for any city worldwide. Features include temperature display in both Fahrenheit and Celsius, animated weather icons, and a responsive design for seamless use across devices.

title: REST Countries API Project
description: A sleek web application that leverages the REST Countries API to provide comprehensive information about countries. Users can effortlessly search for countries, view detailed information, and filter countries by region.

title: Anti Deepfake Video Converter
description: A frontend-only web application that provides a sleek UI prototype for deepfake video detection and conversion. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite, this project offers an interactive interface for exploring how deepfake detection might work.

title: ImagiNet
description: Embark on a visual journey like no other with ImagiNet. Explore a treasure trove of mesmerizing images, each one a masterpiece waiting to inspire. From breathtaking landscapes to awe-inspiring portraits, discover the magic of imagery.

title: Infinitious
description: Endless inspiration with infinite scrolling. Explore captivating images seamlessly on any device. Click, explore, and get lost in a visual journey.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include interactive gameplay, win and draw detection, and responsive design.
